pkgmetadata.longdescription: Terminus Font is a clean, fixed width bitmap font, designed for long (8 and more hours per day) work with computers. Current version contains 879 characters, covers about 120 language sets and supports ISO8859-1/2/5/7/9/13/15/16, Paratype-PT154/PT254, KOI8-R/U/E/F, Esperanto, many IBM, Windows and Macintosh code pages, as well as the IBM VGA, vt100 and xterm pseudographic characters.
